content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1. I work in a doctor's office and I have a rose tattoo on my right ankle.
Hi, I'm participant_2. I'm in college now and want to be a teacher. My family migrated to America when I was five.
That's cool! I'm from America too. What are you studying in college?
I'm studying education. I want to be a high school English teacher.
That's a great goal! I'm sure you'll be a great teacher.
Thanks! I'm excited to start my career after graduation.
Me too! I'm sure you'll do great things.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, play video games, and hang out with my friends.
Cool! I like to read too. What are some of your favorite books?
I like to read a variety of books, but I especially like historical fiction and fantasy.
I love historical fiction too! I'm currently reading "The Nightingale" by Kristin Hannah.
I love that book! I read it a few years ago and I really enjoyed it.
Me too! It's so good. I'm not sure if you've read it, but I also recommend "The Book Thief" by Markus Zusak.
I haven't read it, but I've heard good things about it. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a really good book.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'll definitely check it out.
